document.docAuthor: Anderson, Robert P. & Timm, Robert M.
document.masterDocTitle: A New Montane Species of Spiny Pocket Mouse (Rodentia: Heteromyidae: Heteromys) from Northwestern Costa Rica

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A New Montane Species of Spiny Pocket Mouse (Rodentia: Heteromyidae: Heteromys) from Northwestern Costa Rica

subSubSection.paragraph:
1. Cantón Upala, Dos Ríos, Finca La Selva , 350 m [10 ° 569N, 85 ° 209W, IGCR , 1965],
KU 158450
